name: starter-template
description: A modern full-stack template using React (with Vite), Node.js (Express), and PostgreSQL

scripts.start:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.install:ci: cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend
